## Agent

Which agent needs improvement?

**Agent Name**: @___________

## Improvement Type

- [ ] Add new capability
- [ ] Fix incorrect information
- [ ] Improve response quality
- [ ] Update outdated knowledge
- [ ] Add better examples
- [ ] Improve collaboration with other agents

## Current Behavior

Describe what the agent currently does.

## Desired Behavior

Describe what the agent should do instead.

## Examples

### Current Response
```
[Example of current agent behavior]
```

### Desired Response
```
[Example of what the response should be]
```

## Additional Context

Why is this improvement important? What use cases would it enable?

## References

Any sources, documentation, or examples that support this improvement.

## Checklist

- [ ] I have verified this is the correct agent for this capability
- [ ] I have checked that this improvement doesn't conflict with the agent's specialty
- [ ] I am willing to help implement this improvement (optional)
